Package org.easymock.classextension

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IMockBuilder<T> Deprecated
    Use IMockBuilder instead
    IMocksControl Deprecated
    You can now mock classes directly with IMocksControl
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConstructorArgs Deprecated
    Use ConstructorArgs instead
    EasyMock Deprecated
    You can now mock classes directly with EasyMock
    EasyMockSupport Deprecated
    You can use EasyMockSupport even for class mocking
